titleStmt.title: The absurdity & falsness of Thomas Trion's doctrine manifested in forbidding to eat flesh, contrary to the command of God, the example of angels, Christ Jesus, and the holy apostles : and proved to be doctrine of devils, by the testimony of Holy Scriptures ...
titleStmt.author: Field, John, 1652-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
